hero.subtitle: We are a creative studio passionate about transforming ideas into visual masterpieces. Based in Bandung, we serve clients worldwide.

story.title: OUR STORY
story.p1: Founded in 2020, BARADE STUDIO emerged from a passion to create meaningful design that tells stories and drives results. What started as a small team has grown into a full-service creative studio.
story.p2: We believe in the power of great design to transform businesses. Our approach combines strategic thinking with creative execution, ensuring every project not only looks amazing but also achieves its goals.
story.p3: Today, we're proud to work with clients across Indonesia and beyond, from startups to established brands, helping them stand out in a crowded digital landscape.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: We never compromise on quality. Every pixel, every line of code matters to us.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.desc: Your success is our success. We work closely with you every step of the way.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We stay ahead of trends and bring fresh, creative solutions to every project.

cta.title: LET'S WORK TOGETHER
cta.subtitle: Ready to bring your vision to life?
